OOC: It'll suck if my words pushed him into deciding to leave, but I wont apologize for stating my oppinion.

LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote:Why did he leave?  Ah well, sad to see a rookie leave, but at least some veterans like myself are still around.
----- Original Message ----- 
From: EmprzAnastazia@... 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Thursday, June 05, 2003 12:34 PM
Subject: Re: Conflict at the Ark


In a message dated 6/5/03 6:19:38 AM Central Daylight Time, cardhead649@... writes:


That's it - I'm gone.  I've had it.

If I can't get any respect, I'll go somewhere that I'm appreciated.  
Somewhere that gives a shit that some of its members aren't complete 
Internet junkies that have nothing better to do than hang around one 
website all day.

In short, somewhere a hell of a lot better than this piece of shit!  
As of right now, every character I've got has ceased to exist within 
the confines of NBW.  Empath, Synergy, Wheeljack-X, Phoenix, 
Pumpskin, Flicker (unless dewboy wants him back), Skyblaze, and the 
Rogues are gone.  Vanished without a trace.  Forever.  And so am I!



Would hate to see you go. But if you must, then so be it. 

I'd say more, but I won't. 

Stac
